A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really loved this film. This film is ballsy and the choices that Rian Johnson made were fantastic. I think seeing an older more war torn Luke; cause he’s been through some shit and the choices he made are great. I loved it all. I have some nit picky things with it like some of the Rose/Finn story and Canto Bight but... the positive outweighs the negative\, but that’s my opinion and I am a hardcore Star Wars fan.
